title: ARCHIVE
subtitle: Visual memory
description: Visual documentation of our creative journey with AI

criancas-futuro.title: Children of the Future
criancas-futuro.description: Generative art project connected to a vast network of people focused on a regenerative and ancestral future. Children of all ethnicities with cyberpunk-ancestral aesthetics, where technology is deeply integrated with nature and cultural roots.

velocidades.title: VeloCities
velocidades.description: Nighttime São Paulo in its Brazilian cyberpunk essence. Graffiti-covered alleys, subway, nightlife, skaters and street musicians. The movement and rhythm of great cities captured in neon and shadows.

raizes.title: Roots
raizes.description: Dance, body movement, ancestry and performance. Bodies in expressive motion captured through photographic image studies with generative AI.

egos.title: Egos
egos.description: Dimensional portals, futuristic cities and utopias where technology and nature coexist. The Dream World reveals its complexity from Neturnia, between magical fantasy and the horror of nightmares.

aguas.title: Waters
aguas.description: The water element in its sacred form. Reflections, ancestral memory, bioluminescent waterfalls. The energetic vibration of water as a portal of healing and connection.

criaturas.title: Creatures
criaturas.description: Alien beings, changelings and fantastic creatures from other worlds. Entities that inhabit the threshold between human and supernatural.

guerreiras.title: Warriors
guerreiras.description: Indigenous warrior women in all their strength and resistance. Art created in connection with the Indigenous Women's March - feminine ancestry in struggle.

colagens.title: Ancestral Collages
colagens.description: Ancestral-futuristic fusion in digital collages. Fragments of past and future meet in compositions that connect ancestral symbols with contemporary aesthetics.

tech-shaman.title: Tech Shaman
tech-shaman.description: The Tech Shaman visual universe. Mystical desert, futuristic sanctuaries, sacred geometry. Where ancient code meets future technology in landscapes of contemplation.

origens.title: Origins
origens.description: The first experiments with generative AI in 2022. Mythology, purple/green cyberpunk, exploration of possibilities. The beginning of a visual journey.

futures.title: Futures
futures.description: Visions of tomorrow. Virtual reality, infinite cosmic libraries, immersive technology. Portals between worlds where knowledge floats like stars.
